sections.title: The Prophecies of Nostradamus
sections.thesis: Collective images, historical anxiety, and the psychological mechanisms that generate prophetic meaning.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: Collective meaning-making that can constellate around crisis, symbolism, and projection in historical time.
A transpersonal layer of psyche expressed through archetypal patterns, symbols, and shared images.
The displacement of unconscious contents onto people, groups, or events, distorting perception.

sections.instructions: Hover or focus nodes in the constellation to orient yourself. Use the links below to continue the journey.

sections.body: Synthesis: Collective images, historical anxiety, and the psychological mechanisms that generate prophetic meaning. Next, "The Historical Significance of the Fish" extends the same symbolic field under a new historical and conceptual register.
